Mayor Eric Adams announced New York City's COVID vaccine mandate for city workers will be lifted this week. However, the nearly 2,000 public employees fired for refusing to get the shot won't automatically get their jobs back. The mandate will officially be lifted this Friday.

üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ Want to stay current on the LGBTQ direction in our nation (and our state)? Look no farther.....

This is Fabrice C. Houdart ‚Äî and you've likely never heard of him. 

He lives just over in New York, even has a substack; he is one of the movers and shakers to convincing society that sexual deviance is just hum-drum normal. Excerpt from a LinkedIn post he authored in April 2022 ‚Äî- 

"I know you are all eager to hear my review of The Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Community Center Annual Dinner last night #CenterDinner2022....

The crowd included Kevin Jennings of Lambda accompanied by the "most eligible bachelor" just imported from Philly, a myriad of Governor Hochul's gay staffers (but nobody from Eric Adams ‚Äòoffice) ‚Äì Hochul spoke - Alexander Roque of Ali Forney (who convinced me to take the boys to Family Week in Ptown), 

‚ÄîClaire Shanley, Producer of HBO's "the Gilded Age" 
‚Äîphilanthropist Mitch Draizin
‚Äî a very stylish all-in black Brad Clark (who heads the Gill Foundation), 
‚Äî-gay historian Timothy Stewart-Winter with whom I discussed Eric Cervini's book "The Deviant's War", 
‚Äî-Corey Johnson, who was asking advice from 
‚Äî-Tom Duane, the first openly gay member of New York State Senate, who in turn spent the evening telling me political secrets), 
‚Äî-a bunch of billionaires as they move in pack, and 
‚Äî-Tim Gill/Scott Miller were honored with the Edie Windsor Trailblazer Award.

In his acceptance speech, Gill said that ‚Äúthe fight never ends‚Äù.... https://www.linkedin.com/posts/fabricehoudart_centerdinner2022-murrayhill-community-activity-6920734668199739392-PWPY?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop

Substack: https://fabricehoudart.substack.com/

Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/fabricehoudart/

_source.message:
Hunter‚Äôs Biz Partner Busted With 1,850 Boxes Of Classified Docs

Amid the revelations of boxes of classified documents found to be in President Biden‚Äôs possession from days when he was a vice president and a senator is a new group of documents that are at the University of Delaware. And, the transfer of the boxes of documents, which began in 2010 and had dubious aspects, did not happen until 2012. Now as the strange aspect are coming to light, some are calling for transparency as to the documents, what they contain, and the specifics of the timeline during the transfer of the boxes.

As Biz Pac Review reports:

The story begins in 2010, when a business associate of Biden‚Äôs crack-smoking son, Hunter, was inexplicably assigned the task of transferring the documents from Biden‚Äôs VP office to the University of Delaware. The moving of the documents was reportedly performed by Eric Schwerin, who was Hunter‚Äôs Rosemont Seneca business partner. The 1,850 boxes of documents were moved to the University of Delaware after Biden decided to donate them. While most of the documents were reportedly from his tenure as a Delaware senator, some of the documents were also from the 2009 Obama-Biden presidential transition, as exclusively reported on Thursday by the Daily Mail.

Prior to the documents being moved, the then-VP‚Äôs deputy counsel, Katherine Oyama, reportedly wrote an email to Schwerin warning him that the documents contained 2009 Obama-Biden presidential transition papers that ‚Äúthe vice president likely does not own.‚Äù ‚ÄúShe recommended the inclusion of language about ‚Äòthe University‚Äôs duty to comply with ‚Ä¶ classified information procedures,‚Äô‚Äù according to the Daily Mail. Schwerin subsequently forwarded Oyama‚Äôs email to Hunter and wrote, ‚ÄúFYI ‚Äì if you want to be in the loop. I sent to Mel who is going to talk to your Dad about this and decide who should work on it between him and Jamie.‚Äù Mel was reportedly a reference to attorney Melvyn Monzack, who ‚Äúhandled Hunter and Joe‚Äôs brother Jim‚Äôs taxes and other Biden family affairs,‚Äù according to the Daily Mail.

But the documents didn‚Äôt arrive at the University of Delaware until June 6th, 2012.

‚ÄúThe University of Delaware‚Äôs Morris Library last week welcomed a delivery of 1,875 boxes full of Vice President Joe Biden‚Äôs senatorial papers, the largest collection that the library‚Äôs special collections department has ever received,‚Äù the Newark Post reported at the time. ‚ÄúCrews moved the 33 pallets of boxes from two trucks into the library‚Äôs basement, where the papers were secured on mechanical compact shelving, built especially to accommodate the large collection,‚Äù the Post added.

The library posted about the receipt of the documents:

https://republicbrief.com/hunters-biz-partner-busted-with-1-850-boxes-of-classified-docs/
